class.name: World3D
class.brief_description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world.
class.description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world. A physics space, a visual scenario and a sound space. Node3D nodes register their resources into the current world.

members.member: Direct access to the world's physics 3D space state. Used for querying current and potential collisions.
The World3D's fallback_environment will be used if the World3D's [Environment] fails or is missing.
